citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Pest control. A large number of house flies are present in the outdoor runs on the west and east side of the dog building.
House flies and other insect pests can contaminate surfaces, increase disease risks, and stress animals housed within
the facility. An effective pest control program must be established and maintained to protect the health of the dogs.
Correct by September 25, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Pest control. A large number of house flies are present in the outdoor runs on the west and east side of the dog building. 
House flies and other insect pests can contaminate surfaces, increase disease risks, and stress animals housed within 
the facility. An effective pest control program must be established and maintained to protect the health of the dogs. 
Correct by September 25, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
